programme.title: Maniac!
programme.desc: A Native American travels around a resort town, murdering cops and rich people with a high-powered crossbow, while demanding that the town's richest residents pay him money to stop the killings.

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: The lone inhabitants of an abandoned police station are under attack by an unstoppable street gang.

programme.title: Creature From The Haunted Sea
programme.desc: A crook decides to bump off members of his inept crew and blame their deaths on a legendary sea creature. What he doesn't know is that the creature is real.

programme.title: Killer Fish: Deadly Treasure Of The Piranha
programme.desc: Jewel thieves attempt to recover treasure from piranha infested waters. Mistrust and betrayals happen amongst the gang in the quest for gold.

programme.title: The Monster Club
programme.desc: A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him.

programme.title: Dead Space
programme.desc: A deadly virus attacks the crew of a Saturn space station.

programme.title: Grizzly Rage
programme.desc: A road trip for four high -school buddies celebrating their graduation turns into a lesson in survival when they suffer the wrath of a Grizzly.

programme.title: Killer Fish: Deadly Treasure Of The Piranha
programme.desc: Jewel thieves attempt to recover treasure from piranha infested waters. Mistrust and betrayals happen amongst the gang in the quest for gold.

programme.title: The Monster Club
programme.desc: A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him.

programme.title: House in the Alley
programme.desc: Dark forces invade the home of a young couple after they lose their baby.

programme.title: Sharkansas Women's Prison Massacre
programme.desc: When a fracking environmental accident rips apart the earth's crust, the resulting hole lets out prehistoric sharks from underground. The sharks target a group of women and trap them in a cabin.

programme.title: Asylum
programme.desc: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

programme.title: Wishcraft
programme.desc: Bret eceives a strange box in the mail. A note tells him it will give him three wishes, but just as his new life is beginning, someone is murdering the popular kids in strange, inventive ways.

programme.title: The Exorcist III
programme.desc: A police Lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.
